content.raw: Ideally we would use the commented code, but I observed that at times it misses several links... Which is actually an issue, because the same check is used in [GLWidget.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/0f02a13139cfd52c15eef6c26963a5d0e0970257/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc?at=default#cl-731) (I guess it's harder to reproduce the issue there).  I guess my idea of leaving this code there is to keep in mind that it should be fixed. Maybe I should add a FIXME or TODO and create an issue if this gets merged?
content.html: Ideally we would use the commented code, but I observed that at times it misses several links... Which is actually an issue, because the same check is used in GLWidget.cc (I guess it's harder to reproduce the issue there). I guess my idea of leaving this code there is to keep in mind that it should be fixed. Maybe I should add a FIXME or TODO and create an issue if this gets merged?
